tool_description: Easily validate wallet addresses for the major cryptocurrency networks.
name: Crypto Address Validation API
title: Crypto Address Validation API

api_list.name: Validate
api_list.description:
This endpoint validates the provided address, against the chosen network. The response will tell you if the string you provided is a valid wallet address for a specific network.

Supported networks:

* Bitcoin - btc
* Ethereum - eth
* Monero - xmr
* Litecoin - ltc
* Cardano - ada
* Neo - neo

required_parameters.name: network
required_parameters.description:

* `eth` - eth
* `xmr` - xmr
* `ltc` - ltc
* `ada` - ada
* `neo` - neo
